#summary UTF-8 Characterset conversion.

= UTF-8 Characterset conversion =

Thanks to a great effort of xeqtrobban UTF8 conversion has been added to mangchat


= Details =

  * To enale this future the *#DEFINE USE_UTF8* must be uncommented in _IRCClient.h_
  * you will also need to link iconv.lib wich can be found in /dep aginst the game project
